name: SonyAVR
description: Provides local access to audio zone control of Sony AVRs (STR-DN1070 and STR-DN1080 - possibly others) supporting the Sony Audio Control API.
notice: The 'Audio Control API', also known as 'the tool', is licensed to the user by Sony Video & Sound Products Inc. under the license terms of the Creative Commons Attribution- NoDerivatives 4.0 International Public License, available at https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/4.0/legalcode.

credits.title: sony-poly: a Polyglot NodeServer for Sony Audio Control API Device Integration
credits.author: W. Randy King (Goose66)
